page_content:
L-3 Communications ASA Limited

Service Operation

Process includes design model that captures business drivers, demands, targets, requirements of service, scope /capability of existing services, maturity of current processes and budgets. Considerations aligned with overall service management strategy using processes that use ITILv3 best practices. Processes tailored for customer’s environment to support organisations processes, policies and procedures.

Features

  • Proven capability for problem resolution, workarounds and root cause analysis
  • Tracking of new services and processes using service implementation schedule
  • Software implementation utilises specialised expertise that executes installation and maintenance
  • Extensive knowledge of policing/investigating unauthorised access and legislation compliance
  • Technical/management skills resolve performance issues utilising industry best practice
  • Adherence to regulatory, legal, security, sustainability and routine maintenance standards
  • Expertise in network related activities including investigation and issue resolution
  • Service desk incident management aligns with ITILv3 processes/procedures
  • Proven skill, knowledge and experience implements successful service methodologies/processes
  • Agile, iterative, incremental product development, installation and deployment

Benefits

  • Continual service improvement increases effectiveness/efficiency through optimised automation
  • Enforceable security administration processes define and document access control policies
  • Security administration/ management expertise ensures safe and secure operating environment
  • Application support expertise addresses organisation’s business context and objectives
  • Applying effective storage process to address critical storage management requirements
  • Efficient administration ensures optimal performance, security and functionality managed databases
  • Optimised storage mechanism includes tiered, hierarchical, data de-duplication and visualisation
  • Objective robust, scalable, secure network environment meets current future needs
  • Reduced unplanned labour and other costs associated with service outages
  • Enables efficient and effective IT operations over entire service lifecycle

Pricing

£475 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Hour
